text:
A five-year-old deaf and mute Pakistani girl, who inadvertently crossed the international border here, was handed over to the Pakistani Rangers by the Border Security Force.

The BSF personnel found the girl in Natha Singh Wala Border Outpost area of under Abohar sector along the international border, BSF Inspector-General, Punjab Frontier, Anil Paliwal said. — PTI
title: BSF hands over minor girl to Pak. Rangers
